title.native: アイドルマスター シャイニーフェスタ

description: New anime episodes released with each of the three iDOLM@STER Shiny Festa PSP games (Honey Sound, Funky Note, and Groovy Tune).

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Dancing
tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

__Birth Name:__ Chiaki Takahashi (高橋千晶)
__Height:__ 160 cm

[Website](http://chiaking58.com) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/chiaking58) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/chiaki_takahashi.official)

Chiaki Takahashi is a freelance voice actress, narrator, singer and gravure idol. 
She is a member of the pop group Aice5 together with [Yui Horie](https://anilist.co/staff/95028/Horie-Yui) (leader), [Akemi Kanda](https://anilist.co/staff/95239/Kanda-Akemi), [Madoka Kimura](https://anilist.co/staff/95593/Kimura-Madoka) and [Masumi Asano](https://anilist.co/staff/95077/Asano-Masumi).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Xinyan in Genshin Impact
- Tennant in Reverse: 1999

Naomi Wakabayashi is a female Japanese voice actress. She is most well known for her role as Kudryavaka Noumi from the Little Busters! visual novel and her role as Ritsuko Akizuki from the iDOLM@STER series.

Naomi Wakabayashi is a female Japanese voice actress. She is most well known for her role as Kudryavaka Noumi from the Little Busters! visual novel and her role as Ritsuko Akizuki from the iDOLM@STER series.

[Official Website](http://5pb.jp/shimodaasami/) | [Profile ](https://www.artsvision.co.jp/talent/813/) | [Blog](https://asaponmax.fc2.net) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/shimoda_asami)

Asami Shimoda is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer. She released her first mini album in 2010. Two years later, she released "Awake", her debut maxi single, which was released under 5pb. records. She is affiliated with Arts Vision.

Shimoda's voice samples were used to create Kagamine Rin and Len from Crypton Future Media's Character Vocal Series.

[Official Website](http://5pb.jp/shimodaasami/) | [Profile ](https://www.artsvision.co.jp/talent/813/) | [Blog](https://asaponmax.fc2.net) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/shimoda_asami)

Debuted as a voice actress in 1999 and as singer in 2009 by releasing her first single "Day by Day / Shining Blue Rain" under the 5pb. Records label. Currently working with Eri Kitamura in the music unit ARTERY VEIN.

- Levia - Trillion: God of Destruction (VG)
- Noire / Black Heart - Hyperdimension Neptunia
- Otohana Sumire - Blue Archive

[Profile](http://www.artsvision.co.jp/talent/697/) | [Blog](http://blog.livedoor.jp/eriko_diary/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/eriko_co_log) | [Wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eriko_Nakamura)

She is a voice actress (seiyuu) currently affiliated with Arts Vision. Co-hosted the popular weekly radio show Odoroki Sentai Momonoki Five (おどろき戦隊モモノキファイブ) with fellow voice-actress [Hikasa Youko](https://anilist.co/staff/102263) from 2009 to 2017.

[Profile](http://www.artsvision.co.jp/talent/697/) | [Blog](http://blog.livedoor.jp/eriko_diary/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/eriko_co_log) | [Wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eriko_Nakamura)

She is a voice actress (seiyuu) currently affiliated with Arts Vision. Co-hosted the popular weekly radio show Odoroki Sentai Momonoki Five (おどろき戦隊モモノキファイブ) with fellow voice-actress [Hikasa Youko](https://anilist.co/staff/102263) from 2009 to 2017.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1515331173983330306)

Nishigori graduated from the Toei Animation Institute and joined [Gainax](https://anilist.co/studio/6/) as an in-betweener but he rapidly distinguished himself as a key animator. He was inspired to enter the field because he liked [Hidenori Matsubara](https://anilist.co/staff/107672/) and [Takeshi Honda](https://anilist.co/staff/103303/)'s drawings.

His first major role was serving as character animation director for [Top wo Nerae 2! Diebuster](https://anilist.co/anime/1002/Gunbuster-2-Diebuster/), with the task of adapting [Yoshiyuki Sadamoto](https://anilist.co/staff/98158/Yoshiyuki-Sadamoto)'s character designs for animation. This experience led him to become one of the main character designers at the studio, designing the iconic characters for [Gurren Lagann](https://anilist.co/anime/2001/).

He left Gainax to have his debut as director on [The Idolm@ster](https://anilist.co/anime/10278/The-Idol-Master/), a personal passion project since he's a great fan of the series. Several Gainax staff followed Nishigori to [A-1 Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/561/) and worked on the series, alongside staff from newly formed [Trigger](https://anilist.co/studio/803/Trigger).

In 2018 he directed his original project [Darling in the Franxx](https://anilist.co/anime/99423/), once again reuniting with his Gainax friends spread among [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/), Trigger and [Studio Khara](https://anilist.co/studio/47/).

More recently he worked as character designer and chief animation director for [Hideaki Anno](https://anilist.co/staff/100111/)'s final Evangelion installment, [Evangelion: 3.0+1.0 Thrice Upon A Time](https://anilist.co/anime/3786/Evangelion-3010-Thrice-Upon-A-Time/).

__Height:__ 162 cm (5'4")

[Profile](http://www.artsvision.co.jp/talent/715/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/numakura_manami) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nu_manami/) | [Blog](http://blog.livedoor.jp/mnm_n_/) 

A voice actor affiliated with Arts Vision. She is married to fellow seiyuu [Ryouta Oosaka](https://anilist.co/staff/110743) as of October 23, 2019.

__Height:__ 162 cm (5'4")
